artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Richard Fuchs; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc., Larsen Design Studio
text: Peking, Larsen's first silk velvet, was a new design in the Great Color of China collection. Its eight colorways, Nutria, Puce, Pigeonblood, Persommon, Gold Bronze, Sable, Black Pearl and Pussywillow, richly illustrate the foundational colors used in the Dunhuang murals.
title: Peking
